name: Really Unreal
description:
*ONLY PLAY IN FULL SCREEN MODE*

      This is Really Unreal, a puzzle game about getting a single block to the end by interacting with the real and not-so-real pieces. Figure out the puzzles and place the pieces in the right spots to progress further!

      How to Play

      Use the toolbox on the right side of the screen to access all of the different pieces given to you. Each piece MUST be used in order to start the level. When you start the level, the yellow block must get to the end goal before time runs out. The pieces that you can use will vary from being semi-transparent to not transparent. The semi-transparent blocks aren't real and let the yellow block go through them, while non-transparent blocks collide with the yellow block. You will encounter different types of blocks later on, but that's for you to figure out. Have fun!

Allowed Controls

  • Controller
  • WASD - Space
  • Arrow Keys - Space
  • Mouse
